title: De Beers ' revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2014, and finally slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 7114.0 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 4028.0 was reached at Year 2012
